Package org.neo4j.consistency.newchecker

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Checker  
    CountsState.CountsChecker  
    NodeBasedMemoryLimiter.Factory  
    ParallelExecution.RangeOperation  
    ParallelExecution.ThrowingRunnable  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BatchedRelationshipRecords
    A batch of relationship records as one contiguous piece of memory.
    CheckerContext  
    CountsState
    Keeps observed counts when checking nodes and relationships.
    DynamicNodeLabelsCache
    Basically a dynamically growing int[] to store label ids in.
    EntityTokenIndexCheckState  
    IndexChecker  
    IndexChecker.IndexContext  
    IndexSizes
    Calculates index sizes in parallel and caches the sizes
    NodeBasedMemoryLimiter  
    NodeChecker
    Checks nodes and their properties, labels and schema and label indexes.
    ParallelExecution
    Contains logic for executing checker tasks in parallel.
    RecordLoading
    Loads records.
    RecordReader<RECORD extends AbstractBaseRecord>
    Essentially a convenience for store+record+cursor.
    RecordStorageConsistencyChecker
    A consistency checker for a RecordStorageEngine, focused on keeping abstractions to a minimum and having clean and understandable algorithms.
    RelationshipChainChecker
    Checks relationship chains, i.e. their internal pointers between relationship records.
    RelationshipChecker
    Checks relationships and their properties, type and schema indexes.
    RelationshipGroupChecker
    Checks relationship groups vs the relationships and node refer to.
    SafePropertyChainReader
    A Property chain reader (and optionally checker) which can read, detect and abort broken property chains where a normal PropertyCursor would have thrown exception on inconsistent chain.
    SchemaChecker
    Checks schema records, i.e. indexes and constraints so that they refer to valid tokens and that schema records that refer to other schema records are consistent.
    SchemaChecker.MandatoryPropertiesBuilder  
    SchemaComplianceChecker  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    NodeLink
    Means of parameterizing selection of RelationshipRecord pointers.
    RelationshipChainChecker.ScanDirection  
    RelationshipGroupLink
    Means of parameterizing selection of RelationshipGroupRecord pointers.
    RelationshipLink
    Means of parameterizing selection of RelationshipRecord pointers.
